name: Theatre Lighting Control
short_description:
Theatre lighting control system in Java. 

Initially designed for traditional scenes using ordinary lights, but with future extension in mind - Composite Scene Pattern, Extensible Scene Types (Chase/Flicker), Pluggable dimmer backend
